metadata.author: Alan Glasper
metadata.title: Strategies to promote the emotional health of nurses and other NHS staff
metadata.abstract: Emeritus Professor Alan Glasper, from the University of Southampton, discusses the ongoing NHS Employers initiative which is designed to support the NHS employees' emotional health
